plot: During the course of seven songs by Van Gogh, the most popular Serbian rock band, this tv film tells a love story of two tour guides in an ancient Roman city of Viminacium, located in the heart of Serbia.
title: Tri linije ljubavi
plot_es: During the course of seven songs by Van Gogh, the most popular Serbian rock band, this tv film tells a love story of two tour guides in an ancient Roman city of Viminacium, located in the heart of Serbia.
plot_en: During the course of seven songs by Van Gogh, the most popular Serbian rock band, this tv film tells a love story of two tour guides in an ancient Roman city of Viminacium, located in the heart of Serbia.
